description: Add loading state and icon support to the Button component

modifications.value: Add a 'loading' prop of type boolean with default value false
Add an 'icon' prop of type React.ReactNode that is optional
Add an 'iconPosition' prop of type "left" | "right" with default value "left"
Add support for showing a loading spinner when the loading prop is true and disable the button in this state
Add support for showing an icon either before or after the button text based on the iconPosition prop
Add react-icons as a dependency for the loading spinner
